name: tada-k6-tests
description: K6 load testing suite for TADA media API

scripts.test:stress: npm run build && k6 run dist/scenarios/stress-test.js --env ENVIRONMENT=local
scripts.test:stress:k8s: npm run build && k6 run dist/scenarios/stress-test.js --env ENVIRONMENT=kubernetes
scripts.test:spike: npm run build && k6 run dist/scenarios/spike-test.js --env ENVIRONMENT=local
scripts.test:catalog: npm run build && k6 run dist/scenarios/catalog-test.js --env ENVIRONMENT=local
scripts.test:all: npm run build && npm run test:smoke && npm run test:load && npm run test:stress
